comments.body: Quote from: nitrobetting on May 07, 2022, 05:22:13 PM#KentuckyDerby last 5 winners payoutsðŸ‘‡2021: Medina Spirit $26.202020: Authentic $18.802019: Country House $132.402018: Justify $7.802017: Always Dreaming $11.40I'm not really familiar with how such PAYOUTS are being stated yet I've searched what such numbers are and those where the money bettors would get if they bet on those Horses right. I don't think there can be ways to predict payouts as I both just knew about what this is and the calculations are a bit complex for beginners. (more likely to vary from wagers and odds as well)
